name: HTML
natural_language_description: 这是 HTML 节点。主要用于: Work with HTML

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: generateHtmlTemplate

html.name: html
html.default:
This is an H1 heading

This is an H2 heading

This is a paragraph

notice.displayName: Tips: Type ctrl+space for completions. Use {{ }} for expressions and <style> tags for CSS. JS in <script> tags is included but not executed in n8n.
notice.name: notice
notice.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tips: Type ctrl+space for completions. Use {{ }} for expressions and <style> tags for CSS. JS in <script> tags is included but not executed in n8n.

sourceData.name: sourceData
sourceData.description: If HTML should be read from binary or JSON data
sourceData.natural_language_description: 参数名: Source Data | 作用: If HTML should be read from binary or JSON data | 默认值: json

dataPropertyName.name: dataPropertyName
dataPropertyName.description: Name of the JSON property in which the HTML to extract the data from can be found. The property can either contain a string or an array of strings.
dataPropertyName.natural_language_description: 参数名: JSON Property | 作用: Name of the JSON property in which the HTML to extract the data from can be found. The property can either contain a string or an array of strings. | 默认值: data | (必填项)

extractionValues.name: extractionValues
extractionValues.natural_language_description: 参数名: Extraction Values | 默认值: {'values': [{'key': '', 'cssSelector': '', 'returnValue': 'text', 'returnArray': False}]}

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: capitalize (值: None) - Whether to capitalize the headers
customStyling (值: None) - Whether to use custom styling
caption (值: None) - Caption to add to the table
tableAttributes (值: None) - Attributes to attach to the table
headerAttributes (值: None) - Attributes to attach to the table header
rowAttributes (值: None) - Attributes to attach to the table row
cellAttributes (值: None) - Attributes to attach to the table cell
